name: Unwieldy
description: Attacks with this weapon have +1 difficulty while you are under the effects of the Interdict action. If the character using the Interdict action has the Engaging effect, attacks cannot be made with this weapon.

name: One Handed
description: This weapon must be wielded in one hand.

name: Fast
description: This weapon gains +1 accuracy to hit characters who are not Fatigued.

name: Weak
description: This weapon has +1 difficulty against characters who are Fatigued.

name: Melee Weapon
description: Weapon attacks using this weapon use melee proficiency.

name: Versatile
description: These weapons have 2 different AP costs and 2 different damage values. The user decides which AP cost and corresponding damage value to use.

name: Engaging
description: Having this weapon equipped grants characters the Engaging effect.

name: Ranged Weapon
description: Weapon attacks using this weapon use ranged efficiency.

name: Per Expedition
description: This action can only be taken X times per Expedition

name: Per Combat
description: This action can only be taken X times per Combat
